@sk8rdude461 wrote:

AtomicInt_:

And he is still clueless with the situation, you can’t just give up on him for not knowing, remember we all start somewhere.

I haven’t.
It’s really, really hard to actually help a person when they make a simple mistake that we can’t fix more than say 1 of 2 options…
There’s no real option on the 100 error problem besides double check the code, or get an ide. Unless you want to remove what you added and start over.

item.title: Clickitem.java ERROR
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:16, topic:529345”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=648099.msg4359578#msg4359578 date=1378422599]

maybe learn to not be an arrogant asshole because you have a badge, actually try to help the user. christ.

I threw my code together using the code he supplied. I want him to actually know how to use it. I figured he has used his action handler and such before, so he knew what a switch statement looked like.

Also, I’m being honest, not an asshole.
[/quote]

He is obviously clueless, sorry for being so hostile; but you shouldn’t just tell him to go “learn to code”, that isn’t helping, now that you are a badge holder people are going to look up to you and expect you to actually help them.[/quote]
And I did, in my first reply.

item.title: Clickitem.java ERROR
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:529345”]Oh my god I can see why it didn’t work. That code is nasty as hell.

if(itemId == 11256) { int mysteryReward = Misc.random(5); switch(mysteryReward){ case 0: //code break; case 1: //code break; case 2: //code break; case 3: //code break; default: //code break; } } [/quote]

that code is nasty as hell

[code=java]
int[] items = new int[] {
1, 2, 3, 4, 5, …
}

if (clickedItemId == 11256) {
// … check if slot exists, other inventory checks …
player.getInventory().addItem(new Item(items[Misc.random(items.length - 1)]));
}[/code]

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:13, topic:529345”][quote author=GfServerMaker1 link=topic=648099.msg4359497#msg4359497 date=1378418462]
im getting 100 total errors now.
[/quote]
That means you missed one of these: { }
Maybe learn to code some more…[/quote]

maybe learn to not be an arrogant asshole because you have a badge, actually try to help the user. christ.

item.title: Clickitem.java ERROR
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

Hello, I am trying to make Dragon Impling Jars, along with all the others Lootable, so I went into clickitem.java, and this is what I put for dragon implings :

            if (itemId == 11256) {
            int mysteryReward = Misc.random(5);
            if (mysteryReward == 1) {
            c.getItems().addItem(45, 112);
            c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1);
            c.sendMessage("Enjoy Your Reward! - Custom");
	}
            if (itemId == 11256)  {
            if (mysteryReward == 1) {
            c.getItems().addItem(11212, 53);
            c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1);
            c.sendMessage("Enjoy Your Reward! - Custom");
	}
            if (itemId == 11256)  {
            if (mysteryReward == 1) {
            c.getItems().addItem(7158, 1);
            c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1);
            c.sendMessage("Enjoy Your Reward! - Custom");
	}

please help me! and if you know what to put , please copy + paste , thank you!

Read full topic
